name: Hang in There Until Meetings Are Over
name_original: Hang in There Until Meetings Are Over
description:
Being a polite person consistently is difficult, especially for you , who is intrinsically rude and anti-social. 

But hang in there! You'll get laid off if you don't impress people with how nice you are.

- Increase your relation with one of the three communities up to 100 to get a recommendation of promotion.

- You'll get fired immediately if your relation with one community drop to 0

- You only have limited social energy. Use it wisely.

Recommended Resolution: 1920 x 1080

A game made for Ludum Dare 49.

PostJam fix:

- UI disorder under certain resolution
